page.title: 10 A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My day starts at 4:45 a.m.when I get up,wash,and have breakfast.My mum takes my sister and me to Southend- on-Sea where we train with our competitive swimming club for two hours.After this,about 8 a.m,mum meets us and brings us straight back to the Plume School in Maldon. Our school day starts at 9:05 a.m.and is divided into 8 periods of 35 minutes each,with a break during the morning and for lunch when I eat my sandwiches.At 3:35 p.m.the school bus brings us home to Freshfields farm where I live. After doing our homework we have a meal at about 5:30 p.m.If we have finished all our homework we watch television or read or play until bedtime.Because we get up so early our bedtime is about 7:30 p.m. BY KIRSTY ROWSELL. 1K2.
